repoData.description: BACON is a cutting-edge Bitcoin-based token system designed to incentivize engagement and contributions within the OWASP BLT ecosystem. By integrating with Bitcoin Core and utilizing the Runes protocol, BACON introduces a transparent, secure, and gamified environment that rewards developers and contributors for their efforts.

BACON is a cutting-edge Bitcoin-based token system designed to incentivize engagement and contributions within the OWASP BLT ecosystem. By integrating with Bitcoin Core and utilizing the Runes protocol, BACON introduces a transparent, secure, and gamified environment that rewards developers and contributors for their efforts.
An intelligent Slack bot for the OWASP community
Our design system light and dark mode, logos, colors etc.
The chrome extension to BLT that allows you to take screenshots of websites and report them
Scripts related to projects mainly for high level OWASP project management
Full-featured REST API for OWASP BLT
OWASP repo dashboard with smart insights & metrics
The BLT Newsletter
BLT GitHub App that integrates BLT services into GitHub
an agent that continually scans the web making it secure by reporting bugs
Security related courses and knowledge transfer
The official OWASP BLT App repository

A real-time, AI-powered leaderboard of GitHub repository activity with live play-by-play commentary! Watch as repositories compete for the top spots with an animated sportscaster announcing each event.
An interface to the BLT ecosystem enabling AI agents and developers to log bugs, triage issues, query data, and manage workflows from IDEs or chat interfaces
OWASP BLT - Bug Logging Tools
GSOC related
App Security Ratings
The Slack bot for BLT
BLT on Cloudflare
The client run on your computer to make the web safer
Monitors a website using Github Actions
Allows students to keep track of their voyage through a dashboard of contributions, feedback and documentation
A community-driven job board for the OWASP BLT ecosystem, deployed on GitHub Pages.
Provide security intent and risk guidance before contributors submit code to prevent common mistakes and improve contributor understanding
a fresh, modern design by removing non-core components to create a clear, enjoyable user experience focused on core value
The BLT AI bot that checks your code, updates your priorities and looks at issues through a magnifying glass
secure video chat and voice protection with secure AI notes and consent protection
a self hosted github project to let you conduct a hackthon on your project with charts and leaderboards and prizes
A simple, secure daily check-in application built as a Cloudflare Python Worker. Track your progress, plan your day, and share your mood with your team via Slack or email notifications.
OWASP BLT Main Github Page and Waypoint
Design Contest Website
general team information
Zero Trust Bug Reporting without a trace
metadata aggregation system for OWASP projects
Official documentation for the OWASP Bug Logging Tool (BLT) project
A decentralized CVE database that stays online and offers a backup to CVE and a way to keep it online
PR readiness checker
An open-source, hybrid local+edge privacy toolkit for managing and deleting personal data online.
Privacy-focused time tracking system for developers with GitHub integration and local LLM analysis
Info on the BLT Repos
A github action that lets contributors type /assign to be assigned issues and automatically removes it within 24 hours
OWASP Project compliance checker can be used on other repos too
BLT Ideas
A comprehensive dashboard for tracking and visualizing OWASP (Open Web Application Security Project) repositories and their statistics.
